channel.title: Emerald Dream Client cannot connect
channel.description: Every time I try to connect to this one server using any IP Address that I found in their decompiled client, it will not connect. I even tried using their no-ip link. I did the exact same for my RSPS and it connects almost instantly. The server I am trying to connect to is a PI server using Pkfast source.

item.title: Emerald Dream Client cannot connect
item.dc:creator: @RuneForceGame RuneForceGame

Every time I try to connect to this one server using any IP Address that I found in their decompiled client, it will not connect. I even tried using their no-ip link. I did the exact same for my RSPS and it connects almost instantly. The server I am trying to connect to is a PI server using Pkfast source.
